channel.title: [FIXED]Trying to fix my dad's laptop
channel.description:
[FIXED] - CHECK HERE IF YOU NEED THE FIX! http://www.rune-server.org/computing/operating-systems/windows/620680-trying-fix-my-dads-laptop.html Hey Mopar. I am hoping that someone can easily help me figure out what is wrong with my dad's laptop. He had it looked at by someone, and they said he needs a new operating system on it, and i can only access the BIOS, or launch the last known config. When I go into safe mode / safe mode with online connections, nothing happens. I put in a Windows 7 Installation disk and I got further into booting up, but now I am stuck at a black screen that displays the text:
!! 0xc0190002 !! 2480/100763 (uxtheme.dll)
Any feedback would be greatly appreciated, thank you in advance! [img]http://i.imgur.com/UIf3yQQ.jpg[/img]

item.title: [FIXED]Trying to fix my dad's laptop
item.dc:creator: @FizzerX637 FizzerX637
item.description:
@FizzerX637 wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:2, topic:554770”]So when exactly does the black screen happen.

Is it when you go into last known configuration? or in safe mode?[/quote]

Safe mode, and last known config.

I have fixed my problem using Hiren’s BootCD.

rune-server.ee

Trying to fix my dad's laptop

Rune-Server

Read full topic

Hey Mopar. I am hoping that someone can easily help me figure out what is wrong with my dad’s laptop.
He had it looked at by someone, and they said he needs a new operating system on it, and i can only access the BIOS, or launch the last known config. When I go into safe mode / safe mode with online connections, nothing happens.
